name: Masjidullah Early Child Care Academy (MECCA)
address: Philadelphia, PA (Specific street address not provided in search results)
description: MECCA is an Islamic childcare facility that aims to set children up for success by teaching strong family values, religious knowledge, and leadership skills. Their curriculum is influenced by Islamic concepts, and they introduce Arabic language through songs and poems, particularly in their toddler and preschool programs. They offer programs for infants, toddlers, preschoolers, and school-age children
